name: Sokoban Puzzle Adventure
description:
Starley's secret crush, Darcy, has wandered off with the town’s resident bad boy into the Sokoban Castle! Known for its perilous traps and generally unfriendly megafauna, you’ll need all your wits and courage to prevail in this sokoban puzzle adventure!

Can you unlock the secrets of the Dark Castle and find Darcy?

Gamepad support!

HOW TO PLAY SOKOBAN PUZZLE ADVENTURE

Move Starley around using the touch controller (or a real gamepad, if you have it.) Collect gems to open the chest and get the key to the next room.

Like Sokoban, monsters, boulders, and blocks can only be pushed and not pulled.

Over 50 sokoban levels! Watch out for hostile creatures!
